Data Production Engineer | Hedge-fund | Raleigh, Chicago | ONSITE | Full­time | $120k-$200k+(skill/seniority based) with great benefits

World's leading, tech-driven hedge fund looking Data Production Engineers. We are the best and employ the greatest and brightest. We deal with more than 300+ data sources of huge structured and unstructured datasets on a Terabyte – Petabyte scale. As a Data Production Engineer you will own Data Mining, Collection, Cleansing and Processing of structured and unstructured data. You will evaluate and model new data sources and collaborate with the research and high frequency trading teams. Skills required; Python and/or R, MongoBD and Linux – Skills desired; Node.js, Hadoop or Casandra Also a BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or STEM background.

If you are interested in discussing in more details, please send me an email at: eduardo(dot)herrera(at)njfsearch(dot)com Thanks, Eduardo
